job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Thorough command of both the Windows and Linux Operating Systems, with strong background in troubleshooting either Knowledge of native Kubernetes or related enterprise container platforms such as Open Shift Good understanding of the mechanics of this platform and the deployment pipeline that feeds it Knowledge of Public Cloud Governance frameworks, architectures, configurations, services, and solutions, specifically within Microsoft Azure, but may also include AWS and GCP Knowledge in core Azure services like Azure Kubernetes Service, CosmoDB, Azure Functions, Azure Storage Entities and Concepts, Azure CLI and Powershell Cmdlets Knowledge in Azure organizational entities such as Departments, Accounts, Subscriptions, Resource Groups and Management Groups Skills Fast learner; proactive thinker Ability to innovate, automate, and continually improve processes Excellent verbal and written communication skills Possess critical thinking and analytical skills Capacity to take initiative; desire to become a self-starter
